vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
σπῐλ-όω,
stain, soil, [NT+1st c.BC+]; mark, λευκαῖς (with leucodermia) [Refs] —passive, εἶδος σπιλωθὲν χρώμασι, of a painting, [LXX]: perfect participle ἐσπιλωμένος soiled, Ep. Jud. [Refs 2nd c.AD+]: simply, to be marked, [Refs 3rd c.AD+]
vocabInfos.shortDef: to corrupt; (passive) to be stained, defiled stain
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
to corrupt; (passive) to be stained, defiled stain
to spot, soil; to contaminate, defile, corrupt Jas. 3:6; Jude 23*
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: làm ô uế; làm tì ố. Xem G4696
